due to others only what you like others

the following principles apply to
programming
objective physical communication
takes place at the beta left brain
dimension
using the objective physical senses
the hearing is used for perception and
the voice is used for transmission
subjective spiritual communication takes
place at the alpha right brain dimension
by using the spiritual senses
visualization is used for perception
and Imagination is used for transmission
in the objective physical Dimension the
past is behind us
present is our present position
and the future is ahead of us
in the subjective spiritual Dimension
the past is to your right
present is centered straight ahead
and the future is to your left
we will now impress new information for

screen
to locate your mental screen
begin with your eyes closed turn
slightly upward from the horizontal

approximately 20 degrees relative to
your face
the area that you perceive with your
mind
is your mental screen
without using your eyelids or screens
sent your mental screen to be out away

to improve the use of your mental screen
project images or mental pictures onto

concentrate on mentally sensing and

we will now impress and program the
three scenes technique a technique that

decisions and the guidance that you

when you desire to use the three scenes
technique
go to your center with the three to one
method
create and project onto your mental

an image of the existing situation
recall details of what the situation
looks like in this first scene
make a good study of the existing

if you have programmed for this project

after making a good study of the
existing situation
then shift your awareness to your left

in a second scene to the left of the

use imagination to mentally picture

received
and imagine the desired changes

then in a third scene another 15 degrees

use your imagination to create and
project an image of the situation the
way you desire for it to end up
imagine many people benefiting the more
people who benefit the better
anytime in the future when you think of
this project
visualize recall the image that you
